thread.title: BREAKING: Donald Trump's 'Muslim' ban appeal REJECTED
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Donald Trump's 'Muslim' ban appeal REJECTED

title: BREAKING: Donald Trump's 'Muslim' ban appeal REJECTED
text:
Published 5th February 2017 
DS 
The Donald's travel ban to stop the admission of travellers from seven countries – Iraq, Syria, Iran, Yemen, Sudan, Libya and Somalia – was put on hold by top judges. 
But it has now emerged the block will not be immediately overturned. 
It is a significant blow to The Donald. Britons RAIL against Trump and May Tuesday, 31st January 2017 Monday night saw thousands around the country gather to protest against Donald Trump's immigration ban, and Theresa May's failure to condemn it. 1 / 14 EPA Protesting as only the British can. 
But the US appeals court have insisted the legal brains must make a decision by tomorrow. 
The billionaire has vowed to Americans they will "win". 
He told reporters at his private Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach: "We'll win. For the safety of the country, we'll win." 
MORE TO FOLLOW
